resources.string: Icons have been added to the desktop
Click to add the game space icon to the desktop

Welcome to Red Magic Game Controller. In order to provide you better service, the app requires the following permissions during the process of use:\10 1. Access your location information, including approximate location and accurate location.\10 2. Access your bluetooth informationincluding opening bluetooth,connection bluetooth,cancel pairing.\10\10By clicking Agree, you have agreed to the above contents.

Welcome to GameSpace. In order to provide you better service, the app requires the following permissions during the process of use:\10 1. Access your location information, including approximate location and accurate location;\10 2.In the process of using the software, we need to obtain full network access, including mobile data and WLAN network, the traffic charges generated by the operator directly charged, the details of the operators you belong to.\10\10 By clicking Agree, you have agreed to the above contents.
Are you sure you want to quit?
Customize L/R button according to the game interface
PUBG game: it\'s recommended to correspond L button to the Shoot button and R button to the Aim button
(To set the key position in the game or training ground is recommended)
MOBA game: it\'s recommended to correspond L button to the Shop button and R button to the Summoner Spells button
(To set the key position in the game is recommended)
Customize L/R button according to the game interface

Please go to neoStore to download Game Center before using the function.
Enabling this function can bar Call,SMS,QQ/WeChat Video Call and Voice Call to avoid game being interrupted.
You have played games more than 6 hours today. Please have some rest and arrange your game time reasonably.
